summary: Corwain the Thief, the Ex-Dark Brotherhood member. He is level 80, with maxed out stats. He is the ultimate follower for any player.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/k8gUWnH.png[/img]

[center][size=6]Corwain the Thief![/size][/center]

[center][size=4]This mod creates a follower located in the Bannered Mare. His name is Corwain. Corwain is a professional Thief. Also a member of the Dark Brotherhood, Corwain decided to go on an adventure with any adventurer he chooses, he chose you.[/size][/center]

[center][size=6]Mods that go well with this follower![/size][/center]
[center][size=4]Ultimate Follower Overhaul
(More to come!)[/size][/center]

[center][size=4]I am sorry for lack of detail in the small mod, I am new to the creation center and I am trying it out. I will be coming out with a dungeon mod shortly, so stay tuned![/size][/center]
author: Corwin F
